00047 using namespace Hypertable;
00048 using namespace Hypertable::Config;
00049 using namespace std;
00050 
00051 
00052 namespace {
00053 
00054   const char *usage =
00055     "Usage: random_write_test [options] <total-bytes>\n\n"
00056     "Description:\n"
00057     "  This program will generate random inserts into a table called\n"
00058     "  'RandomTest' with a single column called 'Field'.  The keys are\n"
00059     "  a randomly generated 12 digit number.  The values contain randomly\n"
00060     "  generated ASCII and are of size 'blocksize'\n\n"
00061     "Options";
00062 
00063   struct AppPolicy : Config::Policy {
00064     static void init_options() {
00065       cmdline_desc(usage).add_options()
00066         ("blocksize", i32()->default_value(1000), "Size of value to write")
00067         ("checksum-file", str(), "File to contain, for each insert, "
00068             "key '\t' <value-checksum> pairs")
00069         ("flush", boo()->zero_tokens()->default_value(false),
00070          "Flush after each write")
00071         ("no-log-sync", boo()->zero_tokens()->default_value(false),
00072          "Don't do a commit log sync when buffers are auto flushed")
00073         ("seed", i32()->default_value(1234), "Random number generator seed")
00074         ;
00075       cmdline_hidden_desc().add_options()("total-bytes", i64(), "");
00076       cmdline_positional_desc().add("total-bytes", -1);
00077     }
00078   };
00079 }
00080 
00081 typedef Meta::list<AppPolicy, DefaultCommPolicy> Policies;
00082 
00083 int main(int argc, char **argv) {
00084   ClientPtr hypertable_client_ptr;
00085   TablePtr table_ptr;
00086   TableMutatorPtr mutator_ptr;
00087   KeySpec key;
00088   boost::shared_array<char> random_chars;
00089   char *value_ptr;
00090   uint64_t total = 0;
00091   size_t blocksize = 0;
00092   unsigned long seed;
00093   String config_file;
00094   bool write_checksums = false;
00095   uint32_t checksum;
00096   ofstream checksum_out;
00097   size_t R;
00098   Stopwatch stopwatch;
00099   bool flush;
00100   uint32_t mutator_flags=0;
00101   bool no_log_sync;
00102 
00103   try {
00104     init_with_policies<Policies>(argc, argv);
00105 
00106     if (has("checksum-file")) {
00107       checksum_out.open(get_str("checksum-file").c_str());
00108       write_checksums = true;
00109     }
00110     flush = get_bool("flush");
00111     no_log_sync = get_bool("no-log-sync");
00112     blocksize = get_i32("blocksize");
00113     seed = get_i32("seed");
00114     total = get_i64("total-bytes");
00115     Random::seed(seed);
00116     R = total / blocksize;
00117     random_chars.reset( new char [ R + blocksize ] );
00118     Random::fill_buffer_with_random_ascii(random_chars.get(), R + blocksize);
00119     Random::seed(seed);
00120 
00121     if (no_log_sync)
00122       mutator_flags |= TableMutator::FLAG_NO_LOG_SYNC;
00123 
00124     try {
00125       if (config_file != "")
00126         hypertable_client_ptr = new Hypertable::Client(config_file);
00127       else
00128         hypertable_client_ptr = new Hypertable::Client();
00129 
00130       table_ptr = hypertable_client_ptr->open_table("RandomTest");
00131       mutator_ptr = table_ptr->create_mutator(0, mutator_flags);
00132     }
00133     catch (Hypertable::Exception &e) {
00134       cerr << e << endl;
00135       _exit(1);
00136     }
00137 
00138     key.column_family = "Field";
00139 
00140     char key_data[32];
00141 
00142     key.row_len = 12;
00143     key.row = key_data;  // Row key: a random 12-digit number.
00144     key_data[key.row_len] = '\0';
00145 
00146     {
00147       boost::progress_display progress_meter(R);
00148 
00149       try {
00150         value_ptr = random_chars.get();
00151 
00152         for (size_t i = 0; i < R; ++i) {
00153           Random::fill_buffer_with_random_ascii(key_data, 12);
00154 
00155           if (write_checksums) {
00156             checksum = fletcher32(value_ptr, blocksize);
00157             checksum_out << key_data << "\t" << checksum << "\n";
00158           }
00159           mutator_ptr->set(key, value_ptr, blocksize);
00160           if (flush)
00161             mutator_ptr->flush();
00162 
00163           value_ptr++;
00164 
00165           progress_meter += 1;
00166         }
00167         if (!flush)
00168           mutator_ptr->flush();
00169       }
00170       catch (Hypertable::Exception &e) {
00171         HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00172         _exit(1);
00173       }
00174     }
00175     stopwatch.stop();
00176 
00177     if (write_checksums)
00178       checksum_out.close();
00179   }
00180   catch (Exception &e) {
00181     HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00182     _exit(1);
00183   }
00184 
00185   double total_written = (double)total + (double)(R*12);
00186   printf("  Elapsed time:  %.2f s\n", stopwatch.elapsed());
00187   printf(" Total inserts:  %llu\n", (Llu)R);
00188   printf("    Throughput:  %.2f bytes/s\n",
00189          total_written / stopwatch.elapsed());
00190   printf("    Throughput:  %.2f inserts/s\n",
00191          (double)R / stopwatch.elapsed());
00192   fflush(stdout);
00193   _exit(0); // don't bother with static objects
00194 }
